oneLiner: A expanded item for notification content

apiDoc.name: NotificationItemExpanded
apiDoc.description: An expanded notification item displaying full notification details with border and padding. Features action description, timestamp, full target event content, and actor list (max 10) with count display. Uses Svelte 5 snippet for custom actor count rendering. Perfect for detailed notification views or notification detail pages.
